action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks Joel Just a few things we've picked up
  • The slat design layout isn't the same, on the UK they are close together whereas the au is evenly space
  • Last two widths the text is incorrect update too 152mm and 203mm
  • The slat scans under the WBQ just look a touch blurry
And that's it Warm regards, Keenan DruceCreative Lead + Senior Graphic Designer T: +61 1800 626 462 [url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000 acoufelt.com
